A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

---

He said, "This world fundamentally should not have demons." And thus, all the lands became peaceful.

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women, but his growth peaked.

description.ja: タカミチは魔界に転生して10年。魔界最強の大魔剣士で次期魔王の座すら譲られるほどになっていた…が、悩んでいた。女性との行為によって強くなる『インキュバス』のスキルツリーは既に行き詰まっていたのだ。インキュバスのスキルツリーを解き明かすため、意を決してゲートをくぐるタカミチを待っていたのは…薬師の美少女アウラや魔眼の暗殺者バイオレットとの…エッロすぎる出会いだった（笑）

description.en:
When three Digimon fans – Rika, Henry, and our lead Takato – suddenly find themselves with "real" Digimon, they discover a living creature under your care is far harder to deal with than a few pixels on your TV screen. The kids try to be Digimon 'Tamers,' aka Digimon caretakers, but they all seem to have different opinions on what that should entail. Rika thinks Digimon should fight, Henry thinks they should never fight, and Takato … seems to be somewhere in the middle.  
  
Being a Tamer isn't just about believing one thing or another. It's about learning and adjusting for the good of everyone else. But they have a long way to go, and their problems are just beginning.

(The English translation is based off the script from the FoxKids version of the anime.)

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.

無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…

・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール角明

description.en: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

"You’re its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

description.en: Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied.He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds.While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall.Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is…
description.pt-br: Tenjo Yuuya sofre bully desde criança. Sua vida se resumia em passar o tempo na casa de seu avô e ir para a escola. Porém, ele sofria uma rotina diária de bully severo em sua escola, algumas vezes o pobre Yuuya se via obrigado a pedir licença para curar suas feridas. Mas em uma dessas licenças, ele acaba descobrindo um armazém de objetos que seu avô guardava, e entre esses objetos estava uma porta misteriosa. E claro, ele abriu a porta, e lá ele encontrou…

description.en:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"

The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power.
description.ja: 地上の覇権を争う五種族の大戦が、人間の勝利に終わった時代。だがその世界は、少年カイの目の前で突如として「上書き」された――。
description.pt-br: "Por que ninguém se lembra do mundo verdadeiro...!" A época em que a grande corrida das cinco tribos competindo pela hegemonia no solo terminou com a vitória da humanidade liderada pelo herói Sid. No entanto, o mundo foi de repente "sobrescrito " na frente de um menino chamado Kai. No mundo reescrito, Kai viu a cena onde os seres humanos perderam para as cinco tribos por causa da ausência de herói Sid. Aqui dragões e demônios dominam o solo, e Kai é uma existência esquecida por todos os seres humanos. No entanto, depois de encontrar a misteriosa menina Rinne, Kai decide quebrar este destino reescrito. Em um mundo sem heróis, ele herda a espada do herói e a arte marcial e desafia as raças inimigas poderosas que reinam.

While awkward at first, it doesn't take long for the two to develop a familiar bond that looks more like that of a brother and a sister, than that of niece & uncle.

description.en:
Retired adventurer Belgrieve thought he was done with excitement... but his peaceful life is upended when he discovers a baby abandoned in the nearby woods.

As her adoptive father, he teaches his new daughter Angeline everything he knows about the adventuring life—a past he had thought long forgotten after he lost his leg in battle. Angeline idolizes her father and wants to follow in his footsteps, so she leaves home for the big city.

As the years pass, she ascends the ranks, eventually becoming renowned as an S-Rank adventurer: the Black-Haired Valkyrie. But it turns out that being the best comes with its own struggles, and she can barely catch her breath between battling fiends.

With everyone turning to her for rescue, can Ange get out ahead of each new disaster and finally reunite with her beloved dad?
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37/toi8)
description.ja: 故郷の村で平穏に暮らす元冒険者の男・ベルグリフは、ある日近くの森で捨てられていた女の子を拾い、自分の娘“アンジェリン”として男手一つで育て上げる。月日は経ち――父の背中に憧れ都のギルドへと旅立っていった娘は、冒険者の最高位である「Ｓランク」になっていた…!?

description.en: Celestine, the villainess, suddenly recalls her memories of her past life when she's at the altar, about to be married off to a Prime Minister twice her age and surrounded by the most awful rumours as a punishment for her misdeeds against the Prince and his lover. She realizes that this is the world of an otome game she played in that previous life, but more importantly than that, she also inherits past life's very specific tastes...
description.ja: 王子に捨てられた美貌の悪役令嬢セレスティーヌ。醜い禿げデブオヤジといやがらせ婚の最中……突然よみがえる前世の記憶…！ そして…あれ!? でもなんかこの人…悪くない。ちょっと素敵かも……？ 悪女として、そして枯れ専として、我が道を行くセレスティーヌの華道をご覧あれ！
description.pt: Celestine, a vilã, de repente se lembra de suas memórias de sua vida passada quando ela está no altar, prestes a se casar com um primeiro-ministro com o dobro de sua idade e cercada pelos mais terríveis rumores como punição por seus crimes contra o príncipe e seu amante. Ela percebe que este é o mundo de um jogo otome que ela jogou naquela vida anterior, mas mais importante do que isso, ela também herda gostos muito específicos da vida passada…

description.en:
Since the old days, mystical creatures have existed to help humans. However, now that the times have changed, they suddenly receive a warning from their god: "Prove that you are still needed".

While grappling with how they can assist humans in the modern era, these creatures decide to send their younglings to the human world to seek answers.

Meanwhile, university student Park Geuru, who lives his miserable days commuting for five hours to school due to a sudden move, accidentally ends up making a bet with the goblin Sihan... 

This is a story about the daily life of these young mystical creatures, exploring the human world in order to avoid their own extinction.

altTitles.en: Trash's Circumstances

description.en:
After breaking up with her trashy ex-boyfriend, Jung Eunkyo spends her days peacefully running a café with her friend Kim Haeda. But then, someone appears to disturb her calm life.

“Sunbae, I like you. I fell in love with you at first sight.”

Lee Jaeheon, a young, handsome man who seems to have a twisted side. Eunkyo begins to feel attracted to Jaeheon, who approaches her without hesitation... But Eunkyo’s life, which was already shaken by this new relationship, gradually begins to experience greater turmoil.

(18+ version)
description.fr:
Après avoir rompu avec son ex-petit ami peu recommandable, Jung Eunkyo passe ses journées paisiblement à gérer un café avec son amie Kim Haeda. 

Mais un jour, quelqu’un vient troubler sa vie tranquille.
« Sunbae, je t’aime. Je suis tombé amoureux de toi au premier regard. »
Lee Jaeheon, un jeune homme séduisant qui semble cacher un côté sombre. Eunkyo commence à se sentir attirée par Jaeheon, qui l’approche sans hésitation… Mais la vie d’Eunkyo, déjà bouleversée par cette nouvelle relation, commence peu à peu à connaître des troubles encore plus profonds.
description.pt-br:
Depois de terminar com seu ex-namorado desprezível, Jung Eunkyo passa seus dias pacificamente administrando um café com seu amigo Kim Haeda. Mas então, alguém aparece para perturbar sua vida calma.

“Sunbae, eu gosto de você. Eu me apaixonei por você à primeira vista.”

Lee Jaeheon, um jovem bonito que parece ter um lado distorcido. Eunkyo começa a se sentir atraído por Jaeheon, que se aproxima dela sem hesitação... Mas a vida de Eunkyo, que já estava abalada por esse novo relacionamento, gradualmente começa a experimentar uma turbulência maior.

description.en:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king.
Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.

Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

description.en: Adventurer Bell Cranell's life changed forever when he met the goddess Hestia, becoming the first member of her familia. Since then, he’s gone on many adventures, growing much stronger in the process. But when he steps foot into Orario’s pleasure quarter, where Ishtar Familia reigns supreme, he soon finds himself in way over his head... With enemies all around him, he’ll need the help of a beautiful, fox-eared courtesan if he’s to have any hope of making it back home!
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя. Продолжение "Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье?" от Оомори Фуджино с новым художником Ямачи Тайсей.

An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

altTitles.en: TBATE

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

description.en: Ahn Shiyun is a pitcher who doesn’t mind his team losing streak, as long as he can play baseball. After continuing his dream in middle school, his life begins to change when he meets Baek Tae-Oh, a catcher of the opposing team. This is the story of amazing people who can throw powerful winning shots at the top of high school baseball's elite!
description.fr: Ahn Shiyun est un lanceur qui se fiche de la série de défaite de son équipe, à condition qu'il puisse jouer au baseball. Après avoir poursuivi son rêve au collège avec de mauvais résultats, sa vie commence à changer lorsqu'il rencontre Baek Tae-Oh, un receveur de l'équipe adverse. C'est l'histoire de personnes formidables qui lance de puissants Winning Shot (coup gagnants) au sommet de l'élite du baseball lycéen !
description.ko:
야구를 할 수 있는 조건이라면 팀의 패전조 역할도 마다하지 않는 투수 '안시윤'.
초라한 성적으로 중학교 선수 생활을 이어왔던 그는 상대팀의 포수 '백태오'와의
만남을 계기로 야구 인생이 송두리째 바뀌기 시작한다.

고교야구 정상에서 힘찬 위닝샷을 던지기 위한 뜨거운 청춘들의 이야기!
description.pt-br: Ahn Shiyun é um arremessador que não se importa com a sequência de derrotas de um time, desde que possa jogar beisebol. Depois de continuar sua carreira no ensino fundamental com resultados ruins, sua vida começa a mudar quando ele conhece “Baek Tae-Oh”, um apanhador do time adversário. Esta é a história de pessoas excelentes que lançam tiros vencedores poderosos no topo do beisebol do colégio!

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.en: Too Many Losing Heroines! @comic

altTitles.ja: マケイン

altTitles.en: Loseine

altTitles.th: รักครั้งนี้มีคนนกเยอะไปมั้ย?!

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Alternative Official Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br: O simples, chato e sem amigos Nukumizu Kazuhiko testemunhou algo completamente desconcertante: a garota popular Yanami Anna foi colocada na friend zone por seu crush e amigo de infância! Na verdade, todas as garotas populares ao redor dele estão sendo rejeitadas da mesma forma pelos garotos de quem gostam. Sem perceber, Kazuhiko se envolve no drama do relacionamento onde todas as heroínas principais estão perdendo o amor! Ele pode manter o ânimo delas e ajudá-las a encontrar a felicidade?

altTitles.en: Days with my Step Sister

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

altTitles.ja: 水底

description.en: Takasago Shin, a skilled high school kendo player, faces a turning point in his life. A chance encounter shakes his confidence and forces him to question his path. In the world of clashing swords and quiet rivalries, *Minasoko* explores the pursuit of strength, purpose, and self-discovery.

title.en: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake

altTitles.en: Leo

description.en: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

title.en: Fuufu de Itonamu Monster Farm ~Mezase, Mattari Slow Life~

altTitles.ja: 夫婦で営むモンスターファーム ～目指せ、まったりスローライフ～

altTitles.en: A Monster Farm Run by a Married Couple ~Aiming for a Mellow Slow Life~
Monster Farm Run by a Couple

altTitles.uk: Я тримаю ферму монстрів разом зі своєю дружиною

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Fazenda de Monstros Administrada por Um Casal
Uma Fazenda de Monstros Administrada por Um Casal ~ Visando uma Vida Calma e Suave ~

description.en: Haito and Lina, a newlywed couple, purchase the full-dive VR game "Free Frontier Online". Their reason for playing is to be able to pet and fluff as many monsters as they wish! The two, who are unable to keep pets due to animal allergies, come up with the idea that they can interact with fluffy animals as much as they want in the game, so they start the game as tamers. They thought they started with the purpose of relaxing with the monsters, but before they knew it, they ended up obtaining a familiar stronger than the monsters...!? They will tame, they will battle and they will flirt!
description.ja: 動物が大好きだが、アレルギーによってペットを飼えない新婚夫婦・隼人と里奈。ある日、VRMMO＜フリーフロンティアオンライン＞ではテイマー職になれば魔物を飼育できるという噂を聞き、2人でプレイすることに！もふもふと好きなだけ触れあうことができることを夢見る2人だったが、いきなり強力な従魔を引き当てて・・・！？テイムして、戦って、イチャついて・・・。
description.pt-br: Haito e Lina, um casal recém-casado, compram o jogo VR completo "Free Frontier Online". A razão de jogar é poder acariciar e afofar quantos monstros quiserem! Os dois, que não podem ter animais de estimação devido a alergias a animais, têm a ideia de que podem interagir com bichinhos fofinhos o quanto quiserem no jogo, então começam o jogo como domadores. Eles pensaram que começaram com o propósito de relaxar com os monstros, mas antes que percebessem, acabaram obtendo um familiar mais forte que os monstros...!? Eles vão domar, vão lutar e vão flertar!

altTitles.en: Demons and Strangers

description.en:
A thousand years have passed since the Battle of Primordial Chaos. Shaman bloodlines have become thin and tyrannical demonic beasts mostly hide off in remote mountains. The realm now belongs to Humanity, and it is filled with countless conflicts. We descend from our mountain to join this troubled world. We excel at subduing ghosts and sealing devils; we control spirits and souls alike. We are feared and respected in this world. We are called "Heretics."  
  
Society calls the teachings of the Soul-Controlling Sect, which captures and forms contracts with soul beasts in exchange for power, "Heresy." For Mo Lianjian, a young disciple who lost his parents when he was little, ascending within the sect is difficult, especially when his childhood friend, the prodigy Lian Beibei, is always picking fights. One day, Mo obtains a fragment of a legendary sword rumored to have been owned by the sect's last master swordsman…

After an awkward encounter on her vacation, Wei Lan swapped bodies with a boy named Bai Yuan! Is this heaven's plan, or a trick of fate? Their strings of destiny follow the drifting star in the water.

title.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.ja: 恋人以上友人未満

altTitles.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.pt-br: Mais Que Amantes, Menos Que Amigos

altTitles.ru: Больше чем любовники, меньше чем друзья

description.en: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
description.ja: 東京から地元へ戻った宮子のお見合い相手は互いの秘密を握る元お仕事相手だった！　清楚な文学少女を演じていた元AV女優とオラオラ系男を演じていた元AV男優が素の自分に戻って再会した時、この上もなくピュアなラブが始まる…！カラダは恋人以上、ココロは友人未満!?
description.ru: Мияко, уволившаяся с работы и вернувшаяся в родительский дом, затеяла сватовство. Однако второй стороной оказался бывший коллега, знавший разные секреты.
description.pt-br:
A ex-estrela de AV(Adult Videos) Miyako inesperadamente encontra um ex-colega de trabalho em uma entrevista de casamento...?! O par secretamente conectado está repleto de energia mais pura do que você pode imaginar! 

Esta comédia de amor adulto é diferente e vai curar sua alma.

altTitles.en: Leveling Up, by Only Eating!

altTitles.ja: 飯だけ食ってレベルアップ

altTitles.th: กินจุทะลุเลเวล

altTitles.en: I Eat, to Level Up!

description.en:
Kang Minhyuk suffers from a rare disorder that makes it impossible for him to stop eating. Despite strict diet and exercise, Minhyuk’s weight is now life-threatening. As a last resort, his doctor recommends a unique treatment—Athenae, a VR game where one can eat as much as they want without consequence. Crispy fried chicken! Scrumptious samgyetang! Inside Athenae, all food tastes real, but earning it is no cakewalk. In order to live, Minhyuk must go on the ultimate fantasy gourmet adventure!

personaggio principale è colpito da una rara condizione che colpisce solo due persone in tutto il mondo, la bulimia. Organizza i suoi pasti quotidiani per sopravvivere, ma la sua speranza di sopravvivenza si affievolisce con il passare dei giorni. Consulta un medico, che gli suggerisce di giocare al gioco della realtà alternativa "Athenae", dove può mangiare quanto vuole senza ingrassare. Gioca per salvarsi la vita e crescere in forza non facendo altro che mangiare! Una vita fantastica da gourmet!

サクサクのチキン、伸びるチーズのピザ、夜中の1時に食べるラーメン！ ただおいしいものが食べたいだけなのに… 「暴食欠如症」どれだけ食べても食欲が満たされない奇病。 俺はこの病気のせいで体重170キロの巨漢になり、とうとう生命まで危なくなってしまう！ そこで新しい治療法として仮想現実ゲーム「アテネ」をすることに。 そこでは味が感じられて、おまけにラーメン100杯食べても太らない世界！ たくさん食べたい一心でプレイしていただけなのに、どんどんレベルアップしていって…!?

description.zh-hk:
主角患有全世界只有兩名患者的
罕見疾病——「暴食型飽足感缺失症」，
為了活下去，他每日努力控制飲食，
卻仍看不見希望。

在醫生的建議下，
他進入了虛擬實境遊戲《雅典奈》，
在遊戲裡，就算盡情大吃也不會變胖。
為了活下去而開始玩遊戲的他，
展開了一段美食雲集的奇幻人生!

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

altTitles.en: The Legendary Femboy Bulge Streamer

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

altTitles.ja: もどきども

altTitles.en: Nobunaga's Chef

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

altTitles.en: A Chef of Nobunaga

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.

title.en: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!

altTitles.ja: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！

altTitles.en: The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!

altTitles.hu: A magára hagyott elf lány a világ legerősebb és legaranyosabbja!

description.en:
"Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted."

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to "clear the game" in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
description.hu:
**【Egykori toplistás játékos】+【Játékvilág】= Szuper verhetetlen!? Folytatom az életet a legerősebb énemmel!!**

„Kedves top játékosok! Ez a játék egy valós párhuzamos világ. Ha újjászülettek és megmentitek a világot, bármilyen kívánságotokat teljesítjük.”

Erre az istennő ajánlatára válaszolt Ayano, egykori népszerű szinkronszínész. Azért, hogy ismét ragyoghasson szinkronszínészként, a legerősebb faj, a nemes elf egyikeként született újjá. Most, a legerősebb és legaranyosabb állatfüles hősnővel karöltve, játékbeli tudását felhasználva célja a párhuzamos világban a „játék végigjátszása” - de vajon sikerül-e neki!?
description.ja:
「トッププレイヤーの皆様。このゲームは実在する異世界です。転生し、世界を救えばどんな願いも叶えてあげましょう」

女神からの提案に、元人気声優のアヤノは応えた。炎上して干された今、もう一度声優として輝くために。炎上後にゲームをやり込みトップランカーとなったアヤノは、その知識を生かして、最強種【ハイエルフ】に転生! 最強可愛いケモ耳ヒロイン・ホムラとともに異世界での“ゲームクリア”を目指すが、この世界はただの「ゲーム世界」ではないようで――!?

title.en: Ore no Shibou Flag ga Todomaru Tokoro wo Shiranai

altTitles.ja: 俺の死亡フラグが留まるところを知らない

altTitles.en: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending

altTitles.zh: 不知我的死亡flag将于何处停止

altTitles.fr: Des risques mortels n'arrêtent pas de m'arriver

description.en: When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game's character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story's most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags! Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!
description.ja: 普通の大学生、平沢一希は気が付くと自身がやり込んだゲーム『Brave Hearts』の悪役キャラ、ハロルド・ストークスに憑依していた。 このままゲームのシナリオが消化されていくといずれ主人公たちに倒され死んでしまう！？ 作中でも屈指の強さを誇るハロルドの肉体とゲームの 知識で盛りだくさんの死亡フラグを回避してつかみ取れるか生存ルート！？

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Tochi wo Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They’re dismayed to see he’s useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

altTitles.en: Other World Fluffy Cafe

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

altTitles.ja: 雷雷雷

description.en: Fifty years after the war with the aliens...danger emerges...from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!
description.ja:
ガール・ミーツ・エイリアン！

エイリアンと戦争から50年――

市ヶ谷スミレ、18歳。父親の残した借金返済のため宇宙害蟲駆除会社に勤務する日々。そんなスミレの日常が、UFOにさらわれたことで一変する…！頭の中で聞こえる何者かの声…襲いかかる宇宙害獣…さらには軍事企業からも狙われて――！？

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~
I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

After the appearance of monsters that tear humans apart, society has divided into two parts, “Raiders” and “Non-Raiders.”

24-year-old Lee Semin, unable to become a Raider no matter how hard he tries, confines himself to a small room. One day, he stumbles upon a strange website.

｢ Welcome, new member, to the Transcendental Network - a community connecting transcendent beings across dimensions.｣

They reveal to him the true world of martial prowess. Amidst the chaos where humans and monsters are indistinguishable, the “True Raider” is about to make their entrance!

“Bring it on, you bastards.”
